meanings.definition: Express the sense of words or text in another language.
meanings.sent1: I can translate this book from English to Spanish.
meanings.sent2: She helps to translate important documents for the company.
meanings.sent3: The parrot tried to translate the conversation between the two cats.
meanings.sent4: His smile seemed to translate his happiness to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The app can instantly translate any text you point your camera at.

meanings.definition: Change from one form or medium into another, especially computer data or signals.
meanings.sent1: We need to translate the video file into a different format.
meanings.sent2: The software can translate the audio recording into text.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick seemed to translate the playing cards into real butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions seemed to translate into beautiful music as she played the piano.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was able to translate the feeling of peace and serenity.
